attributes.action: Change regulations to force Banks to pay consumers within a set timescale awards made by the financial ombudsman service
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: we appeal for the law /regulations to be made to ensure that when the Financial Ombudsman Service makes a settlement/award the Bank /insurance company must pay within 4 weeks in full or pay a further £1000 immediately without refund to the claimant as a penalty for late processing/delaying payment.
